Content.title: Greg Berlin
Content.name: Greg Berlin
Content.bodyText:
Awesome!  I'm currently upgrading my blog and getting it all ready for my travel adventures (I'm exploring SE Asia for 3 months from March to June).... this would be absolutely perfect for showing my location in the world.

I was going to do a Virtual Maps macro or data type, but have run out of time so glad u've beaten me to it.  Thanks :)
